Text: Shwayne Booth Jr., known as S.mouse (later as S.mouse!)
Triplets:<S.mouse
1:
--------------------
Text: S.mouse: , is a fictional character from the Australian mockumentary television series, "Angry Boys".
Triplets::<S.mouse
2:
--------------------
<Text: S.mouse:  The character is portrayed by Chris Lilley, who wears a curly wig and blackface makeup.>
Triplets:<S.mouse
3:
--------------------
<Text: S.mouse:  He has appeared in "Angry Boys" since the second episode.>
Triplets:<S.mouse
5:
--------------------
Text: S.mouse:  In the second episode, S.mouse is introduced as the rapper who just released the biggest selling hip-hop single of all time, "Slap My Elbow".
Triplets:<S.mouse
7:
--------------------
<Text: S.mouse:  He also gets dropped from his record label after another one of his videos, Grandmother Fucker, receives many complaints.>
Triplets:<S.mouse
